title: Old Dog, New Tricks
description: Cass Pendleton makes her living helping wives escape from their abusive husbands. She is a professional, respected divorce attorney. She is independent, comfortable, and sure of herself. The last thing she needs is a relationship.  Anson Brown used to be a Navy SEAL He served his country and retired honorably. But he soon finds that retirement wasn't all it was cracked up to be, and when fate puts Jon Rudnick's Guardian Angel Protection Services in his path, he grabs it with both hands.  Now, it's up to Anson to keep Cass safe from a murderous gang dead-set against a divorce going forward. Neither of them was looking for the other, but as soon as they meet, neither of them can deny the attraction.  About the Author  Olivia Dane isn't sure if what she writes is properly called romantic suspense, or erotic thrillers, or military romance, or adventure romances, or what. To be honest, she isn't really concerned about labels. She writes stories about people with guns, and strong wills, who do what they have to and discover love in the process.
author: Olivia Dane
